subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Just weeks after winning her first Grand Slam singles title at Wimbledon last year, Bartoli ended her playing career at 28. She has been happy with the decision.
snippet: Just weeks after winning her first Grand Slam singles title at Wimbledon last year, Bartoli ended her playing career at 28. She has been happy with the decision.
